Get Involved With Girl Develop It in 2015

Girl Develop It is now in over 45 cities across the country. It’s pretty simple to see why; we offer affordable opportunities for women to learn software development. In nearly 5 years, Girl Develop It has grown to nearly 30,000 members across the country and empowers over 1,000 women a month. Why is Girl Develop It so important? Women make up half of the U.S. workforce, but hold just 25% of the jobs in technical...
